#iPhone #iOS #UGREENNAS #UGREEN

There are a ton of iPhone settings and features you might not be aware of but should be. So in this video I go over around 10 different iPhone / iOS security features and settings you should probably consider changing or enabling.

▼ Time Stamps: ▼
0:00 - Intro
0:12 - Accessory Trust
1:19 - Send Last Location
2:16 - A very excellent thing
3:50 - Lock Screen Access To Disable
5:44 - Stolen Device Protection: “Always” Delay
8:19 - Tip For Lost Mode
9:36 - Alphanumeric Passcode
10:32 - Auto-Lock Display Time
11:43 - Lockdown Mode (Or Not)
12:10 - Understanding “Require Attention For Face ID”
12:56 - Maybe: Advanced Data Protection
15:09 - Require Face ID For Any App

title: iPhone Security Features You Should Enable Now!
